overview: Revenge - a dish best served cold. Welcome to a world of deceit and seduction. A scorned woman is never good news! World famous stud Nacho Vidal is chilling at his house in Barcelona when he receives a call from an unknown woman. She asks him to go to his terrace and take a look; there Nacho is greeted by two beauties Caprice and Sasha Rose. Breaking out into a no holes barred threesome...
title: Retribution
